data.title: Lawrence County Indiana
data.meta_description:
Welcome to Lawrence County

Located in South Central Indiana, Lawrence County is, quite literally, part of the bedrock of our nation. Over the past 200 years, limestone from our local quarries has been used to construct some of America's most enduring structures, including the Empire State Building, the Pentagon, the National Cathedral and our own beautiful county courthouse.

While we continue to mine and process some of the worldâ€™s finest architectural stone, new industries have also taken root here, including defense research and development, as well as automotive manufacturing. More and more people are discovering that Lawrence County is a great place to work and to live.

New opportunities for economic growth and community learning are emerging here daily. Our friendly citizenry, gorgeous natural landscapes and vibrant dignity of our history make it easy to see why Lawrence County is becoming one of Indiana's most desirable places to locate. Justice Lawrence Circuit Court
data.text:
LAWRENCE CIRCUIT COURT

Hon. Nathan G. Nikirk, Judge

Hon. Anah H. Gouty, Juvenile Referee

Contact Information:

General Office: 812-275-2421

Fax: 812-275-1044

Location: Lawrence County Courthouse, 916 15th Street, Bedford, IN 47421

Hours: 8:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. (Closed 12-1:00 p.m. for lunch)

Facebook: Stay informed regarding jury duty, holiday and weather closures, and other court business by following the Court on Facebook: Lawrence Circuit Court

Jurisdiction: The Lawrence Circuit Court has jurisdiction over the following cases:

Civil cases

Probate cases (Estates, Guardianships, Adoptions)

Paternity Cases

Civil Protection Orders

Title IV-D Child Support Collection

Civil Collections

Child In Need of Services (CHINS)

Name/Gender Change

Juvenile Delinquency

Termination of Parental Rights (TPR)

One-half of all Dissolution of Marriage Proceedings*

*Dissolution of Marriage cause numbers beginning "47C01" are pending in the Lawrence Circuit Court. Cause numbers beginning "47D01" are pending in the Lawrence Superior Court I.

Legal Forms and Public Notice Link:

Free legal forms are available for certain legal proceedings. Click here or on the Indiana Legal Help (Forms) link below to access the available forms.

If you are required to provide notice by publication you may access the Herald Times public notice page by clicking here or on the Public Notice link below.

The Court Reporters and Bailiff are court employees who are happy to assist with clerical questions regarding your case. However, all court employees are strictly prohibited by law from providing legal advice or assisting with the completion of legal forms. In addition, the Clerk of the Court and the Clerk's staff are also prohibited from providing legal advice or assisting with the completion of legal forms. If you have questions regarding the law or how to complete a legal form, you must contact an attorney for legal advice.

Indiana Legal Help (Forms)

Public Notice

Civil Collection Forms:

Proceedings Supplemental Minute Entry (Attorney use)

Estate Forms:

Estate Claim Form

Small Estate Affidavit

Notice of Open Estate

Guardianship Forms:

Guardianship Oath

Guardian's Inventory

Guardianship Registry Form
